title: the matters specified in subsection (5) of that section, hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000 

(Subsection (4) of Section 251A) (No. 2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2000 (subsection (4) section 251a) (no 2) order 2020

title: the matters specified in subsection (5) of that section, hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The date on which the period to be disregarded under subsection (1) of
text_raw:
2. The date on which the period to be disregarded under subsection (1) of 
section 251A (inserted by section 9 of the Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020)) of the Planning and 
Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) shall end is 23 May 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

8 May, 2020. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th May, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [165] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
